text: The Federation of Bangladesh Chambers of Commerce and Industries (FBCCI; ) is a group for businesspeople in Bangladesh. == History == The Federation of Bangladesh Chambers of Commerce and Industry was established in 1973 under the Trade Organisation Ordinance and Companies Act, 1913. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website of FBCCI Category:Economy of Bangladesh Category:Organisations based in Bangladesh
title: Federation of Bangladesh Chambers of Commerce & Industries
